name: MusicAuthorization.Status
desc: A value that indicates the authorization status the user sets for the current app to access their Apple Music data.

items.name: case authorized
items.desc: The user granted permission for the current app to use MusicKit.

items.name: case denied
items.desc: The user denied permission for the current app to use MusicKit.

items.name: case notDetermined
items.desc: The user has yet to decide whether to authorize the current app to use MusicKit.

items.name: case restricted
items.desc: Apps on this device can’t access MusicKit in a way that the user can’t change.

items.name: init?(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a new instance with the specified raw value.

items.name: var rawValue: String
items.desc: The corresponding value of the raw type.

items.name: typealias RawValue
items.desc: The raw type that can be used to represent all values of the conforming type.
